gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 470 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-34-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes:
The game will throw an error and refuse to start unless "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" is added to the launch options.
The game has noticable mouse input lag which makes the game more difficult, but not unplayable.
title: Slab
